subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Philippe Gilbert shook off Frank and Andy Schleck, brothers from Luxembourg, in an uphill sprint to win the Liege-Bastogne-Liege in Belgium, his fourth classic victory in two weeks.
snippet: Philippe Gilbert shook off Frank and Andy Schleck, brothers from Luxembourg, in an uphill sprint to win the Liege-Bastogne-Liege in Belgium, his fourth classic victory in two weeks.
